channel.title: P 16 blitz xp and max lvl
channel.description: can someone help me out and tell me how to change the max lvl and the amount of xp per hit u get for p 16 blitz ty

item.title: P 16 blitz xp and max lvl
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

When you right click on the objects you get exp from… there will be a number in parenthisis. Search for case ####: in client.java

The #### is the id of the object.

Change the first set of #### to the amount of exp per hit desired. addSkillXP(####*playerLevel[#], #)

Here’s an example… The obect id of Hay is 299, so I would search case 299:

This is what’s in my server. It might not be the exact same in yours.

case 299://hay if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { actionAmount++; if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("WHAT ARE YOU A HORSE?"); addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[1]), 1); ^ ^ ^ Exp per hit Level ID's(defence's ID is 1) actionTimer = 30; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

You probably won’t need the changed the levels ID’s, just the exp per hit part.

Read full topic
item.source: P 16 blitz xp and max lvl
